column4: hey everyone. I have a samba share mounted on my ubuntu box through fstab and smbfs. But when I edit a file on it with vim, sometimes I get "warning the file has been modified since opening it", which definately is not the case. I am the only one who has access to it.
what command should I watch then? Watch executes a command periodically and displays the output. What command should I execute on my file?
